page.title: 11TOURISM IN BROUGH
page.content: OUR AREA IS A NICE QUIET PLACE.THERE IS NOT MUCH TRAFFIC NOW AS THERE IS A BYPASS.IT IS ALSO A VERY HILLY PLACE. TOURISTS COME AND STAY IN THE PUBS AND CARAVANS.THERE ARE THREE PUBS IN BROUGH.THE GEORGE HOTEL,THE CASTLE HOTEL AND THE GOLDEN FLEECE.ALTHOUGH WE HAVEN'T GOT ANY CARAVAN SITES,THEY BRING THEIR CARAVANS AND PARK THEM IN THE NEARBY FIELDS. OUR BLOCK HAS THREE BED AND BREAKFAST HOUSES.TWO OF THEM ARE IN BROUGH AND ONE IN CHURCH BROUGH.IF YOU DO COME FOR A HOLIDAY THERE ARE PLENTY OF ACTIVITIES TO DO LIKE PONY TRECKING BIKE RIDES AND THERE ARE ALOT OF BRIDLEPATHS AND FOOT PATHS. TOURISTS OFTEN LIKE TO GO TO OUR NORMAN CASTLE AND CHURCH.
